email.subject: Advanced Software
email.body:
Hey #PLAYERNAME#, you've been doin' pretty well, I misjudged you honestly, and thanks to what you've done for us, I need you to do something for me, well, for the rest too, I need you to enter a server which contains really good hacking software, although this server is high in security so you may have to be fast and careful with the logs.
I need you to enter and download a executable "SMTPOverflow.exe", It's really useful for opening ports 25, and upload it to the drop server, you'll do a enormous favour to us, I'm counting on you kid.
